title: Worried families in India urge return of crew on ship seized by Iran
summary_full: Iran seized the oil tanker with 18 crew members, including 16 Indians, in December alleging it had illegal diesel.
summary_public: Iran seized the oil tanker with 18 crew members, including 16 Indians, in December alleging it had illegal diesel.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Iran seized the oil tanker with 18 crew members
